name: Pour Time Sideways
effect:
*Cost to Use:* 3 Time.

Move 1 of your {presence} to a
different land with your {presence}.

On the board moved from: During the Invader Phase, Resolve Invader and "Each board/
Each land.{spacer_tiny}.{spacer_tiny}." Actions one fewer time.

On the board moved to: During the Invader Phase, Resolve Invader and "Each board/
Each Land.{spacer_tiny}.{spacer_tiny}." Actions one more time.
